## What is this?

This is a collection of write ups on how to solve the various problems presented by [Github user](https://janismac.github.io/ControlChallenges/) "Janismac".

```{julia}
pwd()
fmuPath = abspath(joinpath(@__DIR__,
    "..",
    "modelica",
    "ControlChallenges",
    "ControlChallenges.BlockOnSlope_Challenges.Examples.WithFriction.fmu"))
isfile(fmuPath)
```
